name: Raja Vaidya

social_proof: Raja Vaidya has 3 TEDx talks, is an international bestselling author, won the Toastmasters International Speech Competition 4 times, won 3rd place in the Ultimate Speaker Philadelphia competition in 2022, and is a 40-year Grandmaster in the Black Belt Hall of Fame.
signature_programs: Raja Vaidya has authored books including an international bestseller with Bob Proctor, and is working on upcoming books 'UN-Box ME Today' and 'Hug a Bully'.
